H0.text: Which fruit has the alternative name the alligator pear. Papaya

H1.text: Which fruit has the alternative name the alligator pear. Guanabana

H2.text: Which fruit has the alternative name the alligator pear. Dragon Fruit

H3.text: Which fruit has the alternative name the alligator pear. Avacado

A4.text: The avocado is also known as the alligator pear.

A5.text: In the United States, the avocado was referred to as alligator pear until 1915.
